column2: 18.10.8 Thrust: EEC▲ The following limitations apply for takeoff with the EECs?
column3: EEC▲ The following limitations apply for takeoff with the EECs in alternate mode:

column2: 18.10.8 Thrust: Both EECs must be in alternate mode.?
column3: Both EECs must be in alternate mode.

column2: 18.10.8 Thrust: 3AA-3PX 26K max (27K max, if planned) takeoff thrust must?
column3: 3AA-3PX 26K max (27K max, if planned) takeoff thrust must be used.

column2: 18.10.8 Thrust: 3RA-3VM TO takeoff thrust must be used.?
column3: 3RA-3VM TO takeoff thrust must be used.

column2: 18.10.8 Thrust: Do not use the FMC takeoff N1 or FMC QRH?
column3: Do not use the FMC takeoff N1 or FMC QRH V-speeds.

column2: 18.10.8 Thrust: Use of autothrottle for takeoff is prohibited.?
column3: Use of autothrottle for takeoff is prohibited.

column2: 18.10.8 Thrust: 27K Bump▲ 3AA-3PX 27 K operations will be authorized for?
column3: 27K Bump▲ 3AA-3PX 27 K operations will be authorized for use by dispatch and may only be selected if it is specified on the load agent generated TPS. 27K thrust may not be selected or requested through ACARS if the TPS is based on any other thrust rating. KSNA operations are not part of this limitation.

column2: 18.10.8 Thrust: Maximum and minimum limitations Red Line?
column3: Maximum and minimum limitations Red Line
